title: ICYMI - Janet Mock Discusses Putting Transgender Characters Front and Center with "Pose"
itunes:title: ICYMI - Janet Mock Discusses Putting Transgender Characters Front and Center with "Pose"
description:
Trevor talks with writer, director and producer Janet Mock about her groundbreaking series "Pose," which focuses on transgender women of color in the 1980s.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
